nodes.text: Drogheda Mining Company was a local corporation on the planet Drogheda run by the ruling family of the world. Their main mining operation was out of the Mount Meru Mine, and during the Drogheda Civil War, the mine was captured by the Drogheda Revolutionaries, hindering the profits of the company. The company was headed by Sarna's father during the height of the Galactic Empire, and several years later, during the civil war, his daughter, Sarna was the head of the company.
